questionText: Which of the following is not a Cloud Service Model?
Which of the following emerging technologies, if fully implemented would jeopardize the security of current encryption technology?
Cloud vendors are help to contractual obligations with specific metrics by ?
drive security decisions?
If the CSC cannot get access to the cloud provider, this affects what portion of the CIA Triad?
You recently worked with a third-party vendor to help you implement a SaaS offering provided by a different company. Which one of the following cloud service roles is not represented here
Which of the following hypervisor types is most likely to be seen in a cloud providers data center?
All of these are reasons an organization may want to consider cloud migration except?
The generally accepted definition of cloud computing includes all of the following characteristics except
You are working on a government project designed to make sure the different cloud services uses in your organization work well together. What goal are you attempting to achieve?
The risk that a customer might not be able to switch cloud providers at a later date is known as?
All of these are characteristics of cloud computing except
When cloud customer uploads personally identifiable information (PII) to a cloud provider, who is ultimately responsible for the security of that PII?
options: The individual who are the subjects of the PII

questionText: We use which of the following to determine the critical paths, processes and the assets of an organization?
If an Organization owns all of the hardware and infrastructure of a cloud data center that is used only by members of that organization which cloud deployment model would this be?
If the cloud deployment model that features ownership by a cloud provider, with services offered to anyone who wants to subscribe is known as
The cloud deployment model that features joint ownership of assets among an affinity group is known as
You are concerned that a attacker might be able to use a guest virtual machine to gain access to the underlying hypervisor. What term describes this threat?
If you are considering purchasing an e-commerce system where the cloud provider runs a hosted application on their own servers. What cloud service category is the provider offering?
If a cloud customer wants to build their own computing environment using storage, networking and computer resources offered by a cloud provider, which cloud service category would probably be best?
Which of the following is not a common method of data discovery?
Sara is planning to implement data labeling for her organization. Which of the following is not a data label field that she should consider?

Sarah is continuing her data labeling efforts and has received suggestions for appropriate data label for data that will be used in multiple countries in which her company operates as part of ongoing security and data lifecycle efforts. Which of the following is not a label that would help with that usage?

Asha wants to document the path that data takes from creation to storage in her institution's database. As part of that effort, she creates a data flow diagram. Which of the following is not a common element of data flow diagram?
options: Credential used for each service listed
Hostnames and IP addresses or address blocks for each system involved
Ports and protocols used for data transfer
Security Controls used at each point in the diagram
correctAnswer: Credential used for each service listed

questionText: Mei wants to conduct data discovery activities in her organization. Which of the following types of data discovery is best suited for identifying all photos that were taken using a specific model of camera based on the original files generated by the camera?

Felix wants to monitor data transfers between two systems inside of his laaS cloud-hosted data center. Which of the following audit mechanism is unlikely to be available to him that is commonly available in on-premise environments?

Megan is documenting roles as part of the implementation of her organization's data classification policy. Her organization uses a SaaS tool to accept applications from customers. What term best describes the SaaS vendor?
Jamie has been informed of legal actions against his company and must now ensure that data relevant to the case is kept. What term describes this?
All policies within the organization should include a section that includes all of the following except?

Melissa knows that many data destruction options are not available for data kept in the cloud due to how the services are architected using shared hardware and services. Which of the following is the best option for her organization to select for cloud-hosted data that must be disposed of in a secure manner?
Which of the following is not a common data right controlled by an IRM system?
Jason wants to properly describe the type of data his organization is using. He knows that the data is stored in MySQL database. What type of data is Jason's org storing?
Sensitivity. Jurisdiction, and criticality might all be considered for what cloud data security activity?
Angela wants to provide users with access rights to files based on their roles. What capability of an IRM system most directly supports this requirement?

Nina's company has stored unstructured data in an S3 bucket in AWS. She wants to perform data discovery on the data, but the discovery tool that she has requires the data to be local. What concern should Nina express about retrieving large volumes of data from cloud services?
options: Data ingress costs may be high
Data egress costs may be high
Data will need to be structured before discovery can run.
correctAnswer: Data egress costs may be high

questionText: Tej wants to conduct data discovery across his organization's databases; however, he knows that data is stored in multiple countries. What concern should he raise before the discovery process is conducted?
options: Structured data is harder to conduct discovery on
The discovery process may create a denial of service condition on DB
Jurisdiction and local laws may impact the ability to perform discovery
Unstructured data is harder to conduct discovery on
correctAnswer: Jurisdiction and local laws may impact the ability to perform discovery

questionText: Naomi has implemented a data archiving process as part of her organization's cloud design. What important part of her archiving plan should she prioritize to ensure its long-term success?
Yasine's organization wants to enable systems to use data controlled by an IRM. What method is most commonly used to identify systems while allowing them to have their trust revoked if needed?
Meena is conducting data discovery with data encoded in JSON. What type of data is she working with?
Isaac wants to describe common information rights management (IRM) functions to his team. Which of the following is not a common IRM function?
